resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158380</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158380</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2787</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Time Capsule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit-Kapsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Capsule de Temps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cápsula Do Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capsula Di Tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρονική κάψα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cápsula Del Tiempo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student assignment for assessment, with instructions for an activity where students are asked to choose one item that reflects their life and that they would like to include in a time capsuleand to explain in writing why they chose it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeranweisung für Einschätzung, 
mit Anweisungen für eine Aktivität, in der Kursteilnehmer gebeten 
werden, ein Einzelteil zu wählen, das ihre Lebensdauer reflektiert 
und das sie in einem Zeit capsuleand einschließen möchten, um im 
Schreiben zu erklären, warum sie es wählten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant pour l'évaluation, 
avec des instructions pour une activité où des étudiants sont 
invités à choisir un élément qui reflète leur vie et qui ils 
voudraient inclure dans un capsuleand de temps pour expliquer dans 
l'écriture pourquoi ils l'ont choisie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante para a avaliação,
com instruções para uma atividade onde os estudantes fossem pedidos 
para escolher um artigo que refletem sua vida e que gostariam de 
incluir em um capsuleand do tempo para explicar na escrita porque a 
escolheram.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo per la valutazione, 
con le istruzioni per un'attività dove gli allievi sono chiesti di 
scegliere un articolo che riflette la loro vita e che vorrebbero 
includere in un capsuleand di tempo per spiegare nella scrittura 
perchè la hanno scelta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση, με τις 
οδηγίες για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι σπουδαστές καλούνται να 
επιλέξουν ένα αντικείμενο που απεικονίζει τη ζωή τους και που θα 
επιθυμούσαν να περιλάβουν σε έναν χρόνο capsuleand για να 
εξηγήσουν στο γράψιμο γιατί το επέλεξαν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante para el gravamen, 
con las instrucciones para una actividad donde piden los estudiantes 
elegir un item que refleje su vida y que quisieran incluir en un 
capsuleand del tiempo para explicar en la escritura porqué la 
eligieron.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lenguaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravamen</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
